column2: ACC Limited (ACC) is a cement manufacturer in India. The company was founded in 1936 and is headquartered in Mumbai. ACC is one of the largest cement producers in the country and has a presence in all major markets. The company's product range includes Portland cement, ready-mix concrete, and aggregates. ACC also has a presence in the construction materials and contracting business through its subsidiaries.

Adani Enterprises Limited is a diversified conglomerate company based in Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India. The company was founded in 1988 by Gautam Adani and has grown to become one of India's largest multinational corporations. Adani Enterprises is involved in a variety of sectors, including infrastructure development, energy, resources, and logistics. The company is known for its large-scale infrastructure projects, including ports, airports, and power plants, as well as its involvement in the coal and renewable energy sectors. Adani Enterprises has operations in India and around the world, including in Australia, Indonesia, and the United States.

Adani Green Energy Limited (AGEL) is a leading Indian renewable energy company and a part of the Adani Group, a diversified conglomerate. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Ahmedabad, Gujarat. AGEL is one of the largest renewable energy companies in India and has a presence across the country. The company's main business is the generation and sale of renewable energy, including solar and wind power. AGEL has a diverse portfolio of renewable energy assets, including solar photovoltaic (PV) and wind power plants, with a total installed capacity of over 13.7 GW as of March 2021. The company has a strong focus on sustainable development and aims to play a significant role in the transition to a low-carbon economy in India.

Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone (APSEZ) is an Indian conglomerate company engaged in the development, operation, and management of ports, special economic zones (SEZs), and other infrastructure projects. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Ahmedabad, Gujarat. APSEZ is the largest port developer and operator in India, and it operates a number of ports and terminals along the country's western and eastern coasts, including the Mundra Port in Gujarat, the Dhamra Port in Odisha, and the Ennore Port in Tamil Nadu. In addition to its port operations, APSEZ is also involved in the development and operation of SEZs, logistics parks, and other infrastructure projects in India.
